title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: wheres URF

> [{quoted}](name=PawanGurung,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=9wLqpbq5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-24T05:25:45.657+0000)
>
> wheres URF

URF will be returning later this year, but it'll be at a lower relative frequency than the other RGM's.
URF gets old pretty fast for a significant amount of the playerbase. They're trying to prevent that by spreading it out more.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
all my rust nerd friends only play (league) when urf is back. OH Riot wouldn't want to do anything to entice unsatisfied customers to return to the game too often now would they!

come on its better than the rest 
others are bit bad not fun to play
GG
doom bots please

> [{quoted}](name=SWAGALAGA,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=9wLqpbq5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-24T05:21:43.077+0000)
>
> doom bots please

Doom Bots is something that Riot's looking to incorporate. For more information on that, check out L4T3NCY's response:

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=vwliJxOr,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-06-05T22:41:31.423+0000)
>
> Yo! Sure, any mode we've previously done is a potential candidate to go into the RGM queue. So, Doom Bots, Black Market Brawlers, etc. We're still optimising the process for maintaining the current stable of modes and just added Definitely Not Dominion as a 'newish' mode, so I can't make any promises for when they might come.
> 
> I'm personally interested in extending the queue beyond the weekend atm (no ETA), so maybe after that we'll have a look.
{{summoner:31}} **plz doom botz**{{champion:115}}

I understand why riot is making urf more spread out but please dear god please can someone from riot or the community explain why poro king is so popular when never once in the 4 years I have been on this game have I ever seen someone say i want poro king back. it was fun. once. the first time your brought it out... for the first day... and I didnt even play it for the whole day.... PLEASE EXPLAIN!!!
every time i see poro king in the line up i sigh....such a lame game mode, id rather play regular aram

> [{quoted}](name=AgroFire,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=9wLqpbq5,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-24T13:49:38.120+0000)

Correct!
> **NO 6 GODS** Matchmade games on Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline or any rotating game mode will not award Champ Mastery level 6 or 7 tokens

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-612-notes#patch-champion-mastery

I agree with Riot making URF the least time of it coming out.
The more people play URF, the worse it becomes, people start to tryhard, and pick the most broken champs there is. Back when it first came out, the first two years of it was bloody amazing because everyone just picked their mains or whoever they wanted, no one cared about broken champs. But then this year, they made it more frequent and everyone player picks the most broken and it's unplayable af.

Somethings I'd change are: 
Put doom bots and black market back.
Make poro king the permanent ARAM gamemode.

Although Riot do need credit for making new gamemodes (Nexus Seige)
The more people play a gamemode, the more worst/unbalanced it becomes, because people just pick the most broken champs or different ways to beat the game.
{{summoner:31}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
